name: Quility Term Plus
features: Instant underwriting decisions for ~70% of applicants; 20% APS-free within 24 hours
Simplified issue process—no paramedical exam or APS for most cases
Face amounts $50,000–$1 million (subject to income multiple limits by age)
Conversion privilege to Quility Universal Life up to age 70 without new evidence of insurability
Accelerated Death Benefit Rider available on face ≥ $100,000 (pays terminal illness benefit)
Children's Level Term Rider available for $25,000 per child (ages 15 days–18 years)
Charitable Giving Rider (no additional premium) pays 1% of face (max $5,000) to a 501(c)(3)
Unemployment Waiver of Premium Rider (waives premium if involuntarily unemployed for 6 months)
